data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 build 16257.1 (insider fast ring), Android 8.0.0
data.actual_result: The desktop client connects to the aforementioned channel
data.expected_result: Mobile discord connects to afforementioned channel
data.short_description: When creating a Discord server using the mobile client whilst the desktop client is running on a computer, the desktop client will auto-connect to the default voice channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Mobile Discord and Desktop Discord running - Create a new server on the Mobile Discord - Watch Desktop Discord connect to the default voice channel
